column1: Appendix table 17.  Number of correctional facilities under state or federal authority that provided work release and number of inmates participating in work release, December 30, 2005
Report title: Census of State and Federal Correctional Facilities, 2005 NCJ 222182
Data source: Census of State and Federal Correctional Facilities, 2005
Appendix table 17.  Number of correctional facilities under state or federal authority that provided work release and number of inmates participating in work release, December 30, 2005
Note: Information on work release programs was not available in 107 facilities.
a/Includes facilities operated by both federal and state authorities.
c/The total number of facilities are as of June 30.
d/ Work release excludes public facilities.

e/As of December 30, 2001, sentenced felons from the District of Columbia were the reponsibility of the Federal Bureau of Prisons. Some inmates were housed in private facilities under contract to the District of Columbia on December 30, 2005.
